oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Busemann functions in a harmonic manifold
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RANJAN, A
SHAH, H
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: harmonic manifolds
busemann functions
horospheres
bi-asymptotes
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: For a noncompact complete and simply connected harmonic manifold M, we prove the analyticity of Busemann functions on M. This is the main result of this paper. An application of it shows that the harmonic spaces having minimal horospheres have the bi-asymptotic property. Finally, we prove that the total Busemann function is continuous in C-infinity topology. As a consequence, we show that the uniform divergence of geodesics holds in these spaces.
